text:
The election control room functioning at the District Collectorate has so far received 107 complaints and action has been taken against all the complaints.

After the model code of conduct came into force, toll free number

1800-425-7021 was introduced for the public and political parities to lodged election related complaints. Officials said that all the complaints were forwarded to the election officials concerned and necessary actions taken.
title: 107 complaints received
